title: The Ballantyne Series by Wilbur Smith (Books 1 to 4)
description:
The Ballantyne Novels are a series of four novels published between 1980 and 1984 by Wilbur Smith. They chronicle the lives of the Ballantyne family, from the 1860s through until 1980Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s. against a background of the history of Rhodesia (now Zimbabwe). Book 2 - Men of Men (1870s-1890s)
